root.name: We Cheer 2
root.description: TracklistIn We Cheer 2, the player will be able to dance on 30 different songs:2 Unlimited - Get Ready For ThisToni Basil - MickeyBlack Eyed Peas - Pump It (Clean Version)Corbin Bleu - Run It Back AgainBlur - Song 2Chumbawumba - TubthumpingMiley Cyrus - GNO (Girls Night Out)Everlife - Real Wild ChildFall Out Boy - Beat It (Feat. John Mayer)Fergie - Glamorous (Clean Version)Get Down With This - Imani CoppolaSelena Gomez - Tell Me Something I Don't KnowHey Monday - HomecomingVanessa Hudgens - Let's DanceLady GaGa - Just DanceAvril Lavigne - GirlfriendDemi Lovato - La La LandJesse McCartney - Leavin' (Radio Edit Remix)Ne-Yo - CloserParamore - WhoaRed Hot Chili Peppers - Higher GroundRihanna - Pon de ReplayRun DMC - Walk This WaySalt N Pepa - Push ItSmash Mouth - All StarSnap! - The PowerThe Cheetah Girls - So Bring It OnThe Go!
